improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error.  The variable 'y' can become 0 during the loop. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before the division.
The final value of x will be -49. Dividing x by y can lead to division by zero if y is 0. Add a check to handle this case.

Unreachable code. The loop iterates 49 times. The variable x starts at 0 and decrements by 1 in each iteration.  Therefore, x will always be less than 0 inside the loop. The condition `x % 2` will always be evaluated.
Redundant print statements. The second print statement is useless.
